title: All celebrity cameos and cast in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
description: Celebrity cameos are a huge part of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, the PlayStation 5 game about going “Oh hey look, it’s that guy” while you navigate the apocalypse. The cast of Death Stranding 2 — both the main cast and the characters who pop up in bit parts — is full of stars […]
author: Jazz Stewart
excerpt: Our rundown of the biggest crossover since Smash Ultimate
text: Celebrity cameos are a huge part of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, the PlayStation 5 game about going “Oh hey look, it’s that guy” while you navigate the apocalypse. The cast of Death Stranding 2 — both the main cast and the characters who pop up in bit parts — is full of stars from various countries, but a lot of these cameos are missable if you don’t know where to look.In this Death Stranding 2: On the Beach guide, we provide a list of all celebrity cameos along with details about where to find them.Full main cast list of Death Stranding 21/12Image: Kojima ProductionsThe main cast of Death Stranding 2 is filled with a mix of recurring characters from the game’s predecessor and new characters exclusive to this sequel.Here’s a list of the main characters in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, with numbers corresponding respectively to the screenshots in the gallery above:Sam — Portrayed by Norman Reedus, known from the TV series The Walking Dead.Fragile — Portrayed by Léa Seydoux, known for roles in movies such as Blue is the Warmest Color and Spectre.Tarman — Portrayed by George Miller but voiced by Marty Rhone. George Miller is the director of the Mad Max franchise, and Marty Rhone is known for being the narrator in Street Fighter 6.Higgs — Portrayed by Troy Baker, a prolific voice actor known for roles in video games like The Last of Us, Metal Gear Solid 5, and Persona 4.Tomorrow — Portrayed by Elle Fanning, known for roles in movies such as the Maleficent movies.Dollman — Portrayed by Faith Akin, but voiced by Jonathan Roumie. Faith Akin directed the movie, Head-On, and Jonathan Roumie portrayed Jesus in The Chosen.Rainy — Portrayed by Shioli Kutsuna, known for her role in Deadpool 2.The President — Portrayed by Alastair Duncan, known for his role as Mimir in God of War and God of War: Ragnarok.Neil — Portrayed by Luca Marinelli, known for his role as Milton in Rainbow: A Private Affair.Lucy — Portrayed by Alissa Jung, known for her role as Mary of Nazareth in Ihr Name War Maria.Heartman — Portrayed by Nicolas Winding Refn but voiced by Darren Jacobs. Nicolas is the director of Drive, and Darren is known for voicing John Constantine in DC: Dark Legion.Doctor — Portrayed by Debra Wilson, known for her many roles in gaming, such as, just this year, Inquisitor Lödwyn in Avowed and Commander Thira in Doom: The Dark Ages.All celebrity cameos in Death Stranding 21/25Image: Kojima Productions/Sony Interactive EntertainmentDeath Stranding 2 not only features celebrities in its main cast but also deploys many as celebrity cameos in the form of preppers. A prepper is someone who lives isolated across the game’s maps, where Sam can make deliveries to.Here’s a list of these celebrity preppers in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach alongside where to find them:Cécile Brun — assumes the role of The Dowser, and you find her at The Dowser location on the map. She is one half of the French art duo Atelier Sento.Colas Koola — assumes the role of The Lone Commander, and you find him at The Lone Commander location on the map. He is the co-director of Stray.Craig Malanka — assumes the role of Glenn Rain, and you find him at Rainbow Valley. He’s the vice president of global marketing for games at Sony Interactive Entertainment.Errolson Hugh — assumes the role of Alex Weatherstone, and you find him at Former Geophysics Research Lab. He is the founder of clothing brand ACRONYM.Gen Hoshino — assumes the role of himself, and you find him at The Musician location on the map. He is an actor and singer-songwriter known for the ending theme of the anime series Spy x Family.Ian Spriggs — assumes the role of Norberto Puente, and you find him at Ciudad Nudo del Norte. He is a 3D digital artist.Jon McElroy — assumes the role of The Inventor, and you find him at The Inventor location on the map. He is a former director at Annapurna Interactive.Kate Siegel — assumes the role of Olivia Westbury, and you find her at West Fort Knot. She is a renowned horror actress known for her role in The Haunting of Hill House.Lauren Mayberry, Martin Doherty, and Iain Cook — play themselves, and you find them at the Animal Shelter. The trio is known as the music group CHVRCHES.Lauren Tsai — plays herself, but she also goes by the name of The Artist. Here’s a detailed guide to finding her as her location is easily missed.Liv Corfixen — assumes the role of The Hydrologist, and you find her in Heartman’s Lab. She’s an actress known for her role in Only God Forgives and is the wife of Nicolas Winding Refn, the actor of Heartman.Lizzielou Corfixen — assumes the role of The Chronobiologist, and you find her in The Chronobiologist location on the map. She’s an actress known for her role in Secrets We Keep and is the daughter of Nicolas Winding Refn.Lola Corfixen — assumes the role of The Metagenomicist, and you find her in The Metagenomicist location on the map. She’s an actress known for her role in Copenhagen Cowboy and is the daughter of Nicolas Winding Refn.Ma Dong-seok — assumes the role of Samson Hook, and you find him at F2 South Distribution Center. He is also known by the name Don Lee and has appeared in films like Train to Busan.Mamoru Oshii — assumes the role of The Pizza Chef, and you find him at The Pizza Chef location on the map. He is known from his work as the director of Ghost in the Shell.Mike Flanagan — assumes the role of Mike Northcoate, and you find him at the Northern Environmental Observatory. He is the Director of Midnight Mass.Molly Quinn — assumes the role of La Madre. You find her at Villa Libre. She’s an actress known for her role as Molly Ravager in The Guardians of the Galaxy films.Olivier Pichard — assumes the role of Peter Gates, and you find him at the Western Environmental Observatory. He is the other half of Atelier Sento, along with Céline Brun.Patrick Claude — assumes the role of Victor Frank, and you find him at the F5 East Distribution Center. He is returning to play his role from Death Stranding.Ray Khalastchi — assumes the role of Benjamin Rivera, and you find him at the C1 South Distribution Center. He is the director of product development at XDEV, a UK-based PlayStation studio.S.S. Rajamouli and S.S. Karthikeya — assume the roles of The Adventurer and The Adventurer’s Son, and you find them at the Adventurer location on the map. S.S. Rajamouli is the director of Baahubali, and S.S. Karthikeya is his son, a movie producer.Swann Martin-Raget — assumes the role of Ridge Frost, and you find him at the Eastern Environmental Observatory. He is the producer of Stray.Usada Pekora — assumes the role of The Data Scientist, and you find him at the Data Scientist location on the map. She is a V-tuber from Hololive Production.Vivien Mermet-Guyenet — assumes the role of Leon Easton, and you find him at East Fort Knot. He’s the co-director of Stray.Yoann Lemoine — assumes the role of The Mechanic, and you find him at The Mechanic location on the map. He’s a musician known as Woodkid and performed the theme of Death Stranding 2.All voice cameos in Death Stranding 2Above is a definitive list of every celebrity and notable figure in the game’s development who has lent their likeness to the completed product. However, the list of cameos does not end there. In proper Kojima fashion, Death Stranding 2 features a bunch of voice cameos that are easy to miss.Here’s a list of all who lent their voice to Death Stranding 2 and where you can hear them:Andi Norris and Riley Rose Critchlow — You can find these two actresses as Armed Woman A and B at the Motherhood location on the map. Andi was the actress behind Donna Beneviento in Resident Evil Village, and Riley played the role of Diesel in Anime Crimes Division.Arnaud Saint-Martin — Arnaud plays the role of The Fisherman at the Fisherman location on the map. Arnaud is the senior direction of external development at Sony Interactive Entertainment.Bastien Dausse — Bastien plays the role of Pierre Southern, you can find him at South Fort Knot F6. He is a French acrobat and artist.Danny and Michael Philippou — Both Danny and Michael play the role of Mr. Impossible at the Mr. Impossible location on the map. The duo is known as RackaRacka on YouTube.Edward Saito — Edward assumes the role of The Pioneer at The Pioneer location on the map. Edward Saito is a producer at Sony Interactive Entertainment.Kevin Ko — Kevin plays the role of The Ghost Hunter at The Ghost Hunter location on the map. Kevin Ko is the director of the horror film Incantation.Koichi Yamanoha — Koichi is the Tar Therapist at The Tar Therapist location on the map. He’s also known as the musical artist Grimm Grimm.Laurie Jezequel — plays Bianca North. You can find her at the North Distribution Center F7. Laurie is a producer at Sony Interactive Entertainment.Neil Johnson — plays Gregory Southall. You can find this character at the Southern Environmental Observatory. Neil is a senior producer at XDEV, a UK-based PlayStation Studio.Takahiro Miura — plays The Phantom Smith at the Phantom Smith location. Takahiro’s known for his role as Jean in the Attack on Titan live-action films.Yusaku Matsumoto — plays The Architect, located at the Architect location on the map. He’s the director of the 2017 film Noise.For more Death Stranding 2: On The Beach guides, here’s our recommendation on where to find the Artist and where to find the Inventor.
html:
Celebrity cameos are a huge part of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, the PlayStation 5 game about going “Oh hey look, it’s that guy” while you navigate the apocalypse. The cast of Death Stranding 2 — both the main cast and the characters who pop up in bit parts — is full of stars from various countries, but a lot of these cameos are missable if you don’t know where to look.

In this Death Stranding 2: On the Beach guide, we provide a list of all celebrity cameos along with details about where to find them.

Full main cast list of Death Stranding 2

1/12Image: Kojima Productions

The main cast of Death Stranding 2 is filled with a mix of recurring characters from the game’s predecessor and new characters exclusive to this sequel.

Here’s a list of the main characters in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, with numbers corresponding respectively to the screenshots in the gallery above:

  1. Sam — Portrayed by Norman Reedus, known from the TV series The Walking Dead.
  2. Fragile — Portrayed by Léa Seydoux, known for roles in movies such as Blue is the Warmest Color and Spectre.
  3. Tarman — Portrayed by George Miller but voiced by Marty Rhone. George Miller is the director of the Mad Max franchise, and Marty Rhone is known for being the narrator in Street Fighter 6.
  4. Higgs — Portrayed by Troy Baker, a prolific voice actor known for roles in video games like The Last of Us, Metal Gear Solid 5, and Persona 4.
  5. Tomorrow — Portrayed by Elle Fanning, known for roles in movies such as the Maleficent movies.
  6. Dollman — Portrayed by Faith Akin, but voiced by Jonathan Roumie. Faith Akin directed the movie, Head-On, and Jonathan Roumie portrayed Jesus in The Chosen.
  7. Rainy — Portrayed by Shioli Kutsuna, known for her role in Deadpool 2.
  8. The President — Portrayed by Alastair Duncan, known for his role as Mimir in God of War and God of War: Ragnarok.
  9. Neil — Portrayed by Luca Marinelli, known for his role as Milton in Rainbow: A Private Affair.
  10. Lucy — Portrayed by Alissa Jung, known for her role as Mary of Nazareth in Ihr Name War Maria.
  11. Heartman — Portrayed by Nicolas Winding Refn but voiced by Darren Jacobs. Nicolas is the director of Drive, and Darren is known for voicing John Constantine in DC: Dark Legion.
  12. Doctor — Portrayed by Debra Wilson, known for her many roles in gaming, such as, just this year, Inquisitor Lödwyn in Avowed and Commander Thira in Doom: The Dark Ages.

All celebrity cameos in Death Stranding 2

1/25Image: Kojima Productions/Sony Interactive Entertainment

Death Stranding 2 not only features celebrities in its main cast but also deploys many as celebrity cameos in the form of preppers. A prepper is someone who lives isolated across the game’s maps, where Sam can make deliveries to.

Here’s a list of these celebrity preppers in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach alongside where to find them:

  1. Cécile Brun — assumes the role of The Dowser, and you find her at The Dowser location on the map. She is one half of the French art duo Atelier Sento.
  2. Colas Koola — assumes the role of The Lone Commander, and you find him at The Lone Commander location on the map. He is the co-director of Stray.
  3. Craig Malanka — assumes the role of Glenn Rain, and you find him at Rainbow Valley. He’s the vice president of global marketing for games at Sony Interactive Entertainment.
  4. Errolson Hugh — assumes the role of Alex Weatherstone, and you find him at Former Geophysics Research Lab. He is the founder of clothing brand ACRONYM.
  5. Gen Hoshino — assumes the role of himself, and you find him at The Musician location on the map. He is an actor and singer-songwriter known for the ending theme of the anime series Spy x Family.
  6. Ian Spriggs — assumes the role of Norberto Puente, and you find him at Ciudad Nudo del Norte. He is a 3D digital artist.
  7. Jon McElroy — assumes the role of The Inventor, and you find him at The Inventor location on the map. He is a former director at Annapurna Interactive.
  8. Kate Siegel — assumes the role of Olivia Westbury, and you find her at West Fort Knot. She is a renowned horror actress known for her role in The Haunting of Hill House.
  9. Lauren Mayberry, Martin Doherty, and Iain Cook — play themselves, and you find them at the Animal Shelter. The trio is known as the music group CHVRCHES.
  10. Lauren Tsai — plays herself, but she also goes by the name of The Artist. Here’s a detailed guide to finding her as her location is easily missed.
  11. Liv Corfixen — assumes the role of The Hydrologist, and you find her in Heartman’s Lab. She’s an actress known for her role in Only God Forgives and is the wife of Nicolas Winding Refn, the actor of Heartman.
  12. Lizzielou Corfixen — assumes the role of The Chronobiologist, and you find her in The Chronobiologist location on the map. She’s an actress known for her role in Secrets We Keep and is the daughter of Nicolas Winding Refn.
  13. Lola Corfixen — assumes the role of The Metagenomicist, and you find her in The Metagenomicist location on the map. She’s an actress known for her role in Copenhagen Cowboy and is the daughter of Nicolas Winding Refn.
  14. Ma Dong-seok — assumes the role of Samson Hook, and you find him at F2 South Distribution Center. He is also known by the name Don Lee and has appeared in films like Train to Busan.
  15. Mamoru Oshii — assumes the role of The Pizza Chef, and you find him at The Pizza Chef location on the map. He is known from his work as the director of Ghost in the Shell.
  16. Mike Flanagan — assumes the role of Mike Northcoate, and you find him at the Northern Environmental Observatory. He is the Director of Midnight Mass.
  17. Molly Quinn — assumes the role of La Madre. You find her at Villa Libre. She’s an actress known for her role as Molly Ravager in The Guardians of the Galaxy films.
  18. Olivier Pichard — assumes the role of Peter Gates, and you find him at the Western Environmental Observatory. He is the other half of Atelier Sento, along with Céline Brun.
  19. Patrick Claude — assumes the role of Victor Frank, and you find him at the F5 East Distribution Center. He is returning to play his role from Death Stranding.
  20. Ray Khalastchi — assumes the role of Benjamin Rivera, and you find him at the C1 South Distribution Center. He is the director of product development at XDEV, a UK-based PlayStation studio.
  21. S.S. Rajamouli and S.S. Karthikeya — assume the roles of The Adventurer and The Adventurer’s Son, and you find them at the Adventurer location on the map. S.S. Rajamouli is the director of Baahubali, and S.S. Karthikeya is his son, a movie producer.
  22. Swann Martin-Raget — assumes the role of Ridge Frost, and you find him at the Eastern Environmental Observatory. He is the producer of Stray.
  23. Usada Pekora — assumes the role of The Data Scientist, and you find him at the Data Scientist location on the map. She is a V-tuber from Hololive Production.
  24. Vivien Mermet-Guyenet — assumes the role of Leon Easton, and you find him at East Fort Knot. He’s the co-director of Stray.
  25. Yoann Lemoine — assumes the role of The Mechanic, and you find him at The Mechanic location on the map. He’s a musician known as Woodkid and performed the theme of Death Stranding 2.

All voice cameos in Death Stranding 2

Above is a definitive list of every celebrity and notable figure in the game’s development who has lent their likeness to the completed product. However, the list of cameos does not end there. In proper Kojima fashion, Death Stranding 2 features a bunch of voice cameos that are easy to miss.

Here’s a list of all who lent their voice to Death Stranding 2 and where you can hear them:

  1. Andi Norris and Riley Rose Critchlow — You can find these two actresses as Armed Woman A and B at the Motherhood location on the map. Andi was the actress behind Donna Beneviento in Resident Evil Village, and Riley played the role of Diesel in Anime Crimes Division.
  2. Arnaud Saint-Martin — Arnaud plays the role of The Fisherman at the Fisherman location on the map. Arnaud is the senior direction of external development at Sony Interactive Entertainment.
  3. Bastien Dausse — Bastien plays the role of Pierre Southern, you can find him at South Fort Knot F6. He is a French acrobat and artist.
  4. Danny and Michael Philippou — Both Danny and Michael play the role of Mr. Impossible at the Mr. Impossible location on the map. The duo is known as RackaRacka on YouTube.
  5. Edward Saito — Edward assumes the role of The Pioneer at The Pioneer location on the map. Edward Saito is a producer at Sony Interactive Entertainment.
  6. Kevin Ko — Kevin plays the role of The Ghost Hunter at The Ghost Hunter location on the map. Kevin Ko is the director of the horror film Incantation.
  7. Koichi Yamanoha — Koichi is the Tar Therapist at The Tar Therapist location on the map. He’s also known as the musical artist Grimm Grimm.
  8. Laurie Jezequel — plays Bianca North. You can find her at the North Distribution Center F7. Laurie is a producer at Sony Interactive Entertainment.
  9. Neil Johnson — plays Gregory Southall. You can find this character at the Southern Environmental Observatory. Neil is a senior producer at XDEV, a UK-based PlayStation Studio.
  10. Takahiro Miura — plays The Phantom Smith at the Phantom Smith location. Takahiro’s known for his role as Jean in the Attack on Titan live-action films.
  11. Yusaku Matsumoto — plays The Architect, located at the Architect location on the map. He’s the director of the 2017 film Noise.

For more Death Stranding 2: On The Beach guides, here’s our recommendation on where to find the Artist and where to find the Inventor.
